metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9892 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 5.x through5.0.34, 6.x through 6.0.17, and 7.x through 7.0.6. An attacker who islogged into OTRS as an agent user with appropriate permissions may try toimport carefully crafted Report Statistics XML that will result in readingof arbitrary files on the OTRS filesystem.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
